sentence: While Liz Cheney was cavorting with Never Trump sissies and squeezing donors, her opponent Harriet Hageman was at CPAC and word is that the Beltway Cowgirl is doomed.
author: Kurt Schlichter
title: The Big News Out of CPAC 2022 Is That Trump Is Back
